name: Night in the Garden
description:
Our hero receives a letter from his beloved Granny, where she asks to look after her favorite flower. You need to water the flower, but the well is dry. No problem! Granny saved some jerrycans for cases like this. To tell the truth, she doesn’t really remember where exactly she put them, but they are definitely somewhere in the garden.

Easy-peasy! Or not? It seems like Granny forgot to tell us more about her garden...

Collect all jerrycans and water the flower in front of the house. Use the flashlight to confront the monsters.

Control:

  • W/A/S/D - move
  • E - interaction
  • Mouse - flashlight direction
  • Esc - pause

Don’t worry about your progress: even if you exit the game, it will be saved.

Version 1.1.0:

  • Enemies fixes
  • Save-system improvement (now player is saved after collecting jerrycans too)
  • Audio fixes

Version 1.1.1:

  • Minor fix on game map
